crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'conference' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name, 'owner_id': doc.owner_id}); }

listing_by_name.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'conference' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.name, null);}

conference_map.map: function(doc) { if (doc.flow.module != 'conference' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var featurecode = (!doc.featurecode) ? false : doc.featurecode; emit(doc.flow.data.id, {'numbers': doc.numbers}); }
